title: Punk
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A sling made of weird green leather, oozing corrosive slime. Originally the weapon of a notorious mischief-maker and general scamp, it's since fallen into less savoury hands.}} [[File:Urand punk.png]] '''''the +3 greatsling "Punk"''''' +3 [[greatsling]] (modified [[sling]]: 10 base damage) [[Acid]] brand (100% chance to deal 2d4 [[acid]] damage to monsters; 50% chance to inflict [[corrosion]])
[[Corrosion|rCorr]] ==Desirability== '''Punk'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|481}} is a strong weapon, despite its low enchantment. Very few monster resist acid, and the [[corrosion]] effect significantly increases your damage output (-8 [[AC]], doesn't stack). As a sling, it's one-handed, unlike most [[Ranged Weapons]]. ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], Punk's base type was a [[fustibalus]] instead of a modified sling. It had -1 accuracy as a result. *Prior to [[0.19]], Punk had a [[freezing]] brand. *Prior to [[0.15]], Punk was a +9, +12 [[sling]] instead of a greatsling (greatslings were later renamed into fustibali). ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Slings]]
